name: Touchy Touchy
description:
Touch Touchy is a two-player co-op puzzle game where two cubes need to find and touch each other with the help of various abilities.

The game is in prototype state right now. There are only 5 abilities (about 7 are in plans), not many levels and the graphics and sounds are far from final. But first I need to know how do you feel about the current state. Thanks for getting here and trying it out, every feedback is appreciated. :)

The best way to give feedback is this form: https://goo.gl/forms/sF7Az4sga6H4NP6c2 (only available in Hungarian for now)

Unfortunately this version doesn't have Linux and macOS builds, but they will be back soon hopefully.

Have fun!
